class.name: SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer
class.brief_description: Audio player with multiple simultaneous voices.
class.description: An audio player with multiple simultaneous voices, configurable through the `max_voices` parameter.

method.name: get_voice
method.description:
Get a voice by index.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var my_player := $SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer as SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer var first_voice := my_player.get_voice(0) ----

method.name: play
method.description:
Play a stream on an auto-selected voice.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var my_player := $SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer as SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer my_player.play(my_stream) ----

method.name: play_on_player
method.description:
Play a stream on a specific player.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var my_player := $SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer as SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer var first_voice := my_player.get_voice(0) my_player.play_on_player(my_stream, first_voice) ----

method.name: play_on_voice
method.description:
Play a stream on a specific voice.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var my_player := $SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer as SxAudioMultiStreamPlayer my_player.play_on_voice(my_stream, 0) ----
